author: Loris Carotenuto
description: Montenegro amaro dominates this bittersweet delicately orangey aperitif cocktail.
name: The Queen's Steeple
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
15 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredient with ice and strain into chilled glass
